price: ߓߊ ߒ߬ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߒ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߢߍ߫ ߢߊߞߘߐߛߘߌ߫ ߕߌߙߊ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
